name: ElasticMapReduceStepHadoopJarStepConfig
description: HadoopJarStepConfig is a property of the AWS::EMR::Step resource that specifies a JAR file and runtime settings that Amazon Elastic MapReduce (Amazon EMR) executes.

properties.name: Args
properties.desc: A list of command line arguments passed to the JAR file's main function when the function is executed.

properties.name: Jar
properties.desc: A path to the JAR file that Amazon EMR runs for the job flow step.

properties.name: MainClass
properties.desc: The name of the main class in the specified JAR file. If you don't specify a value, you must specify a main class in the JAR file's manifest file.

properties.name: StepProperties
properties.desc: A list of Java properties that are set when the job flow step runs. You can use these properties to pass key-value pairs to your main function in the JAR file.
properties.type: List of Amazon Elastic MapReduce Step HadoopJarStepConfig KeyValue
